Name: Encounter: Tempest
Description:
Before the game begins, put The Tempest onto the field.
Before each night, you lose the game if there are 8 or more ⏳ on The Tempest.
As time passes, add X ⏳ to The Tempest, where X is the number of actions on your field.

Name: The Tempest
Description:
After you play an action, you may discard it instead of performing its effect to remove 1 ⏳ from this duration.
After you play an action that deals damage to the deck, draw an encounter card.
Don't discard this when it has 0 ⏳ time on it.

Name: Torrential Rain
Description: You lose X vitality, where X is the number of ⏳ on The Tempest.

Name: Storm's Maw
Description:
This enemy can't attack if there are exactly 4 ⏳ on The Tempest.
This enemy gets +X ❤️, where X is number of ⏳ on The Tempest.

Name: Rising Tides
Description: Add ⏳ to The Tempest until there are at least X ⏳ on it, where X is the number of cards on your field.

Name: Funnel Clouds
Description: As time passes, add 1 ⏳ to The Tempest.

Name: Spout Kraken
Description: As this enemy attacks, add 1 ⏳ to The Tempest.

Name: Building Pressure
Description:
Add 1 ⏳ to the Tempest.
Set this event aside and shuffle it into the encounter deck at the end of the night.
Surge.

Name: Fog Wraith
Description: This enemy can't be dealt damage unless there are exactly 4 ⏳ on The Tempest.
